samples.name: POL_FLAG_1
samples.description: Flag indicating antenna polarisation mode.

samples.name: POL_FLAG_2
samples.description: Flag indicating antenna polarisation mode.

samples.name: SUN_FOV
samples.description: If set, Direct Sun correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel

samples.name: SUN_GLINT_FOV
samples.description: If set, Reflected Sun correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel. Sun correction is based on the Sea bi-static coefficients defined in the AUX_BSCAT ADF and computed for a fixed wind speed of 7 m/s and wind direction of 0 deg North

samples.name: MOON_FOV
samples.description: If set, Direct Moon correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel

samples.name: SINGLE_SNAPSHOT
samples.description: If set, this scene has not been combined with an adjacent scene in opposite polarisation during image reconstruction to account for cross-polarisation leakage (it has been processed with only co- polar antenna patterns information)

samples.name: SUN_POINT
samples.description: If set, this pixel is located in a zone (circle around Sun alias position with radius configurable through Sun_Point_Flag_Size field in AUX CNFL1P) where a Sun alias was reconstructed (if Sun removal is active, measurement may be degraded)

samples.name: SUN_GLINT_AREA
samples.description: If set, this pixel is located in a zone where Sun reflection has been detected using the bi-static scattering coefficient threshold defined in the configuration file

samples.name: MOON_POINT
samples.description: If set, this pixel is located in a zone where a Moon alias was reconstructed (after Moon removal, measurement may be degraded)

samples.name: AF_FOV
samples.description: If set, the pixel is inside the exclusive zone of Alias free (delimited by the six aliased unit circles)

samples.name: BORDER_FOV
samples.description: If set, the pixel is close to the border delimiting the Extended Alias free zone or to the unit circle replicas borders (also known as “suspenders and belts”). Distance threshold is configurable through FOV_Border_Flag_Size field in AUX CNFL1P

samples.name: SUN_TAILS
samples.description: If set, this pixel is located in the hexagonal alias directions centred on a Sun alias (if Sun is not removed, measurement may be degraded in these directions)

samples.name: RFI_H_POL
samples.description: If set, the analysis of the NIR Brightness Temperatures or System Temperatures standard deviation in H polarisation has reported this snapshot as an outlier of the expected trend, which is a clear indicator of the presence of one or more RFI sources in the data; that the Temperatures were saturated or in the vicinity of such saturation and there is a high probability that the measurement is affected

samples.name: RFI_V_POL
samples.description: If set, the analysis of the NIR Brightness Temperatures or System Temperatures standard deviation in V polarisation has reported this snapshot as an outlier of the expected trend, which is a clear indicator of the presence of one or more RFI sources in the data; that the Temperatures were saturated or in the vicinity of such saturation and there is a high probability that the measurement is affected

samples.name: RFI_2
samples.description: If set, the measurement is affected by point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (flag is set in a circle around the RFI position, with a radius dependant on the RFI expected BT defined in the AUX RFILST), or it has exceeded the threshold defined in BT_Dual/Full_RFI_Pixel_Flag_Threshold fields in AUX CNFL1P, or is negative for Dual Polarisation values

samples.name: RFI_3
samples.description: If set, the measurement is affected by the tails of a point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (tail width is dependant on the RFI estimated BT (from each snapshot measurements) , corresponding to 0.16 of the radius of the RFI circle flagged)

samples.name: USGS_SEA_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 95 percent (1); below 95 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_LAND_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is below 10 percent (1); above 10 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_MIXED_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 10 and below 95 percent (1); below 10 or above 95 percent (0)

samples.name: 200_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 200 km (1); greater than 200 km (0)

samples.name: 100_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 100 km (1); greater than 100 km (0)

samples.name: 40_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 40 km (1); greater than 40 km (0)

samples.name: MIN_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for all months (1); is not present for all months (0)

samples.name: MAX_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for any months (1); is not present for any months (0)

bands.name: BT_Value_X
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, obtained by DFT interpolation from L1b data, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: BT_Value_Y
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, obtained by DFT interpolation from L1b data, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: BT_Value_XY_Real
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, obtained by DFT interpolation from L1b data, antenna XY polarisation, real value

bands.name: BT_Value_XY_Imag
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, obtained by DFT interpolation from L1b data, antenna XY polarisation, imaginary value

bands.name: Pixel_Radiometric_Accuracy_X
bands.description: Error accuracy measurement in the Brightness Temperature, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Pixel_Radiometric_Accuracy_Y
bands.description: Error accuracy measurement in the Brightness Temperature, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Pixel_Radiometric_Accuracy_XY
bands.description: Error accuracy measurement in the Brightness Temperature, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Incidence_Angle_X
bands.description: Incidence angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Incidence_Angle_Y
bands.description: Incidence angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Incidence_Angle_XY
bands.description: Incidence angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Azimuth_Angle_X
bands.description: Azimuth angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Azimuth_Angle_Y
bands.description: Azimuth angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Azimuth_Angle_XY
bands.description: Azimuth angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Faraday_Rotation_Angle_X
bands.description: Faraday rotation angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Faraday_Rotation_Angle_Y
bands.description: Faraday rotation angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Faraday_Rotation_Angle_XY
bands.description: Faraday rotation angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Geometric_Rotation_Angle_X
bands.description: Geometric rotation angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Geometric_Rotation_Angle_Y
bands.description: Geometric rotation angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Geometric_Rotation_Angle_XY
bands.description: Geometric rotation angle value corresponding to the measured BT value over current Earth fixed grid point, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis1_X
bands.description: Elliptical footprint major semi-axis value, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis1_Y
bands.description: Elliptical footprint major semi-axis value, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis1_XY
bands.description: Elliptical footprint major semi-axis value, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis2_X
bands.description: Elliptical footprint minor semi-axis value, antenna X polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis2_Y
bands.description: Elliptical footprint minor semi-axis value, antenna Y polarisation

bands.name: Footprint_Axis2_XY
bands.description: Elliptical footprint minor semi-axis value, antenna XY polarisation

bands.name: Flags
bands.description: L1c flags applicable to the pixel for this particular integration time

bands.name: BT_Value_H
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, ground H polarisation

bands.name: BT_Value_V
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, ground V polarisation

bands.name: BT_Value_HV_Real
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, ground HV polarisation, real value

bands.name: BT_Value_HV_Imag
bands.description: Brightness temperature measurement over current Earth fixed grid point, ground HV polarisation, imaginary value

bands.name: Pixel_Radiometric_Accuracy_H
bands.description: Error accuracy measurement in the Brightness Temperature, ground H polarisation

bands.name: Pixel_Radiometric_Accuracy_V
bands.description: Error accuracy measurement in the Brightness Temperature, ground V polarisation

bands.name: Pixel_Radiometric_Accuracy_HV
bands.description: Error accuracy measurement in the Brightness Temperature, ground HV polarisation

bands.name: Stokes_1
bands.description: 1st Stokes parameter over current Earth fixed grid point

bands.name: Stokes_2
bands.description: 2nd Stokes parameter over current Earth fixed grid point

bands.name: Stokes_3
bands.description: 3rd Stokes parameter over current Earth fixed grid point

bands.name: Stokes_4
bands.description: 4th Stokes parameter over current Earth fixed grid point

bands.name: Land_Sea_Mask
bands.description: Flag indicating Land/Sea USGS content, Coastline distance, and Ice content
